title: How to Send an Animated Heart on WhatsApp on iOS

steps.title: Open WhatsApp.
steps.content: Open WhatsApp. It’s a green icon with a white chat bubble inside. You’ll usually find it on your home screen.

steps.title: Tap the text box.
steps.content: Tap the text box. It’s the oval box at the bottom of the screen. This opens the keyboard.

steps.title: Tap and hold the globe key on the keyboard.
steps.content: Tap and hold the globe key on the keyboard. A list of keyboards will appear.

steps.title: Tap the next-to-last Emoji category.
steps.content: Tap the next-to-last Emoji category. The categories are the gray icons at the bottom of the keyboard—the next-to-last category is 4 symbols, including a music note, ampersand (&), percent (%).

steps.title: Tap the simple red heart.
steps.content: Tap the simple red heart. Be sure not to choose a different color or variety of heart—only the regular red heart will appear animated when sent in WhatsApp.

steps.title: Tap the send icon.
steps.content: Tap the send icon. It’s the paper airplane icon at the bottom-right corner of the conversation. An animated heart will now appear in your chat.
